title: support for VNC proxy (mirror)
author: kl0p31
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->
There is no support for VNC proxy or mirror service. This is why I am still using mRemote.

iterations.description: VNC proxy support is a significant protocol-level feature requiring upstream VNC library changes, out of scope for our fork which focuses on stability and bug fixes

notes:
AI triage: VNC proxy support is a significant protocol-level feature requiring upstream VNC library changes, out of scope for our fork which focuses on stability and bug fixes
Approach: Would require integrating proxy/tunneling support into the VNC protocol handler; cross-referenced with #1568 suggesting this is a long-standing upstream request with no traction
